Builtin Exceptions

1. RouteNotFoundException

Dinoloop throws RouteNotFoundException when it receives a request that does not match an endpoint.

List of properties

  • httpVerb: string - placeholder for HttpVerb request
  • requestUrl: string - placeholder for endpoint
  • type: string - placeholder for exception type
  • message: string - placeholder for custom message

Here is how you can handle by writing your version of ServerError middleware


    

    
    
        
  • It is a run time exception which can be caught by the ServerError middlewares
    • 
        
  • It is recommended to register
            RouteNotFoundErrorMiddleware as the first ServerError middleware.

2. InvalidRouteException

    
Dinoloop throws
        InvalidRouteException when null/undefined values are provided as route paths to
        @Controller(null) or
        @Controller(undefined) or other http verbs like
        @HttpGet. 

    
List of properties

    
    
        
  • 
            httpVerb: string - placeholder for HttpVerb request
    • 
        
  • 
            action: string - placeholder for action method
    • 
        
  • 
            controller: string - placeholder for controller
    • 
        
  • 
            route: string - placeholder for complete endpoint
    • 
        
  • 
            type: string - placeholder for exception type
    • 
        
  • 
            message: string - placeholder for custom message
    •
